Compares the underlying iterator of {{c|x}} with the underlying sentinel of {{c|y}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|join_view::''sentinel''&lt;Const&gt;}}}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|[[cpp/ranges/join_view/iterator|iterator]] to compare}}
{{par|y|sentinel to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|1= x.current_ == y.end_}}, where {{tti|current_}} denotes the underlying iterator, {{tti|end_}} denotes the underlying sentinel.
